hillbillies.model.unit

Class RestActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.unit.Activity
      • hillbillies.model.unit.RestActivity

  • class RestActivity
extends Activity
    The activity for resting.

    • Method Detail

      • advanceTime

        @Model
void advanceTime(double dt)
        Updates the state of the rest activity.
        Specified by:
        advanceTime in class Activity
        Parameters:
        dt - The time step that is given.
        Postcondition:
        If the unit does not have full hitPoints his hitPoints will regen. Else if the unit does not have full stamina his stamina will regen. Else the unit will stop resting.

      • canSwitch

        boolean canSwitch()
        Returns true if the unit can switch activities.
        Specified by:
        canSwitch in class Activity
        Returns:
        The unit may switch when the activity isn't in the initial rest.
            result == !this.isInitialRest()

      • reset

        @Raw
void reset()
        Resets the rest.
        Specified by:
        reset in class Activity
        Postconditions:
      • The activity is in it's initial rest
            new.isInitialRest() == true
      • The point difference is reset.
            new.getRestDiff() == 0
      • The timer is reset.
            new.getRestTimer() == REST_DELAY
